metadata.feature_description: Modify user's reputation and experience points with validation and note tracking

steps.action: Navigate to Users > Select User > Activity Tab
steps.expected: Activity panel opens showing user stats with Edit Points link
steps.actual: Activity panel opened showing RANK: 7, REPUTATION: 6, EXPERIENCE: 6, with 'EDIT POINTS' link visible

steps.expected: Edit mode activates with editable input fields for Reputation, Experience, and Notes
steps.actual: Edit mode activated with input fields for Reputation (6), Experience (6), Notes textarea, and Cancel/Save buttons

steps.action: Change Reputation to 10 and Experience to 15 in edit mode
steps.expected: Values are updated in input fields
steps.actual: Reputation changed to 10, Experience changed to 15 in input fields

steps.expected: Values reset to original (6, 6) and edit mode closes
steps.actual: Values reset to REPUTATION: 6, EXPERIENCE: 6, edit mode closed with 'EDIT POINTS' link visible again

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit Points with Valid Values and Save

steps.action: Enter valid values - Reputation: 10, Experience: 20 (Reputation <= Experience)

steps.expected: Changes saved, UI updates to reflect new values
steps.actual: Save successful. RANK recalculated to 5, REPUTATION: 10, EXPERIENCE: 20. Last Active updated to 'moments ago'

steps.action: Enter multiline note in Notes textarea with 3 lines
steps.expected: Multiline text accepted in Notes field
steps.actual: Multiline note entered: 'Test note for points adjustment.' / 'Line 2: Testing multiline support.' / 'Line 3: Final line of note.' - all 3 lines visible in textarea
Save successful, note accepted and saved with the point changes
Error notification displayed: 'Experience points can not be negative'. Save was blocked (500 error returned from server)

steps.action: Set Reputation to 30 and Experience to 15 (Reputation > Experience)
steps.actual: Reputation set to 30, Experience set to 15
Error notification displayed: 'Reputation points can not be more than experience'. Save was blocked (500 error returned from server)

observations: Feature requires DNNSOCIAL SKU - Edit Points UI elements only appear when getSKU() returns 'DNNSOCIAL'
Feature requires EditPoints permission on the PersonaBar Users module
Rank is automatically recalculated when reputation/experience points are updated
The 'Last Active' timestamp updates to 'moments ago' when points are saved, indicating user activity is recorded
Error notifications appear as toast messages and auto-dismiss after approximately 5 seconds
Delta calculation is performed server-side when user has existing score (new value - current value)
